channel.title: 718 Setting Old Item Look to Default
channel.description:
Hey all,
I'm currently busy developing SlaveScape, which is a 718/736 source.
Everything is going well, but I'd like to set the "old item look" instead of the new item look to default.
Hope you guys can help me out here :)

item.title: 718 Setting Old Item Look to Default
item.dc:creator: @Potzon Potzon
item.description:
@Potzon wrote:

[quote=“SlaveScape, post:3, topic:477512”][quote author=Potzon link=topic=595707.msg4194410#msg4194410 date=1357303119]
Why not use a “::switchitemslook” command? I’m sure there are players that likes the new items.
[/quote]

I’d give it a try. Thanks for your feedback![/quote]
Here’s a command if you need one,

case "switchitemslook": player.switchItemsLook(); player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("You are now playing with " + (player.isOldItemsLook() ? "old" : "new") + " item looks."); return true;

Read full topic
item.source: 718 Setting Old Item Look to Default
